p: In order to evaluate uncertainty in population growth and distribution patterns, BOD estimates generated in BenMAP using the 2050 ICLUS population data for the A2 scenario were compared to the results derived using 2050 Woods & Poole data [ 17]. The Woods & Poole population projections are based on an economic forecasting model [ 32] while the ICLUS project used a demographic model with migration rates consistent with the IPCCâ€™s A2 scenario [ 33].
